content: The Wolf Assassin is located in Chapter 1 and can be quite tricky to find. Locating him is much easier after collecting the upgrade that allows you to identify Spirits. You can find the Wolf Assassin on the way up to Bodhi Peak after exiting the cave. Head up the path a little until you reach a large wooden platform. There is a small plank of wood on the left leading to a secret area.
